attributes.action: Remove Tony Blair as Official 'Peace Maker'
attributes.additional_details:
Pray, relieve Tony Blair from the position of 'Peace Maker - Middle East', and cease all future payments to him in the execution of the terms of this Office.
It is quite apparent from recent surveys and comments from the public in the latest news items involving Tony Blair, that he does not command the confidence of any.   This fact alone should be enough to suggest to Tony Blair that he should resign from all Public Offices, and that his wife, Cherie, should do likewise.
The vast sums of money paid to Tony Blair are, therefore, not justified from the 'Governmental Purse', and should cease to be paid forthwith.
Further, to support the action requested, many instances of Tony Blair using 'economical truths' concerning the Country entering into aggression with Middle Eastern Countries, have been uncovered.
Please take note of the views of the General Public.
